title: DMV Practice Test - Road Signs
description: Test your knowledge of common road signs and their meanings

questions.question_text: What does a red octagonal sign mean?
What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
What does a round sign with a red circle and slash mean?

title: DMV Practice Test - Traffic Laws
description: Test your knowledge of basic traffic laws and regulations

questions.question_text: What is the default speed limit in a residential area?
When must you use your headlights?
options: 30 minutes after sunset to 30 minutes before sunrise

questions.question_text: What should you do at a yellow traffic light?
options: Stop if you can do so safely
questions.correct_answer: Stop if you can do so safely
